September&nbsp;30, 2003</p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">72</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='72',FILE='C:\fc\73144050191_D10496_919035\2947-1-ga.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Mar 14 14:41 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(7)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Incorporated by
reference to the exhibits to Registrant&#146;s Forms 8-K filed on
January&nbsp;21, 1998 and February&nbsp;11, 1998</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(8)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Incorporated by reference
to the exhibits to Registrant&#146;s Form&nbsp;10-Q filed for the quarter
ended December&nbsp;31, 1986</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(9)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Incorporated by
reference to the exhibits to Registrant&#146;s Form&nbsp;10-Q filed on
February&nbsp;13, 2001</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(10)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160; </font>Incorporated by reference to
the exhibits to a Registration Statement on Form&nbsp;S-8, File
No.&nbsp;33-41285</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(11)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160; </font>Incorporated by reference to
the exhibits to Registrant&#146;s Form&nbsp;10-K filed for the year ended
March&nbsp;31, 1995</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(12)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160; </font>Incorporated by reference to
the exhibits to a Registration Statement on Form&nbsp;S-8, File
No.&nbsp;333-130846</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(13)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160; </font>Incorporated by reference to
the exhibits to a Registration Statement on Form&nbsp;S-8, File
No.&nbsp;333-130848</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(14)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160; </font>Incorporated by reference to
the exhibits to Registrant&#146;s Form&nbsp;10-Q filed on July&nbsp;28, 2000</p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">73</font></p>
</div><br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='73',FILE='C:\fc\73144050191_D10496_919035\2947-1-ga.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Mar 14 14:41 2006' -->



<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">

<div>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><a name="ReportOfIndependentRegisteredPubl_122122"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Report
of Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">We have audited the consolidated financial statements
of SkyWest,&nbsp;Inc. and subsidiaries (the &#147;Company&#148;) as of December&nbsp;31,
2005 and 2004, and for each of the three years in the period ended December&nbsp;31,
2005, and have issued our report thereon dated March&nbsp;9, 2006 (included
elsewhere in this Form&nbsp;10-K). Our audits also included the financial
statement schedule listed in Item 15(a)&nbsp;of this Form&nbsp;10-K. This
schedule is the responsibility of the Company&#146;s management. Our responsibility
is to express an opinion based on our audits.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 24.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In our opinion, the
financial statement schedule referred to above, when considered in relation to
the basic financial statements taken as a whole, presents fairly in all
material respects the information set forth therein.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">/s/ Ernst&nbsp;&amp; Young
LLP</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Salt Lake City, Utah<br>
March&nbsp;9, 2006</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">74</font></p>
</div><br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

  </td>

  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">

undersigned, thereunto duly authorized, on March&nbsp;13, 2006.</font></p>

  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="152" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:113.85pt;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">March&nbsp;13,
  2006</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="176" colspan="3" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:132.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:10.0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">/s/ ROBERT G. SARVER</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="24" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:18.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:10.0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="234" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:175.85pt;">
  <p style="margin:10.0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="22" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:16.35pt;">
  <p style="margin:10.0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="152" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:113.85pt;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:10.0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="176" colspan="3" valign="top" style="border:none;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:132.0pt;">

  </td>

  </td>
  <td width="234" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:175.85pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Director</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="22" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:16.35pt;">

</DOCUMENT>
<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.8(B)
<SEQUENCE>2
<FILENAME>a06-2947_1ex10d8b.htm
<DESCRIPTION>MATERIAL CONTRACTS
<TEXT>
<html>

<head>





</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.8(b)</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">AMENDMENT NO.&nbsp;1</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">TO</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">SKYWEST,&nbsp;INC.</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1995
EMPLOYEE STOCK PURCHASE PLAN</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THIS AMENDMENT, (the &#147;Amendment&#148;) is made
effective as of the 31<sup>st</sup> day of December&nbsp;1995 by SkyWest,&nbsp;Inc.,
a Utah corporation (the &#147;Company&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">RECITALS</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, effective November&nbsp;8, 1994, the
Company adopted the SkyWest Inc. 1995 Employee Stock Purchase Plan (the &#147;Plan&#148;)
for the purpose of providing a method whereby employees of the Company and
certain of its subsidiaries would have an opportunity to acquire a proprietary
interest in the Company.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, subsequent to the adoption of the
Plan, the Company has determined it advisable and in the best interests of the
Company to execute this Amendment to amend the Plan to incorporate the
modifications set forth below;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOW THEREFORE, upon these premises, the Plan
is hereby modified, altered and amended in the following respects only:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Amendments</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Section&nbsp;6.1
shall be amended to read in its entirety as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Number
of Option Shares</u>. On the applicable Offering Commencement Date, a
participating Employee shall be deemed to have been granted an option to
purchase on the Offering Termination Date a number of shares of Common Stock
determined by dividing such participating Employee&#146;s contributions accumulated
prior to such Offering Termination Date and retained in the participating
Employee&#146;s account as of the Offering Termination Date by the lower of (i)&nbsp;eighty-five
percent (85%) of the market value of a share of Common Stock on the offering
Commencement Date, or (ii)&nbsp;eighty-five percent (85%) of the market value
of a share of Common Stock on the Offering Termination Date; provided, however,
that the maximum number of shares of Common Stock an Employee may&nbsp;purchase
during each Offering shall be determined at the Offering Commencement Date by
dividing $25,000 ($12,500 in the case of a six-month Offering) by the market
value of a share of Common stock on the Offering Commencement Date, and
provided further that such purchase shall be subject to the limitations set
forth in Article&nbsp;10 or any other applicable provisions of the Plan. For
purposes of this Section&nbsp;6.1, the market value of a share of Common Stock
shall mean the closing sale price of the Common stock on the applicable date
(or the nearest prior business day on which shares of Common Stock traded on
the NASDAQ/NMS if no shares of Common Stock traded on the applicable date) as
reported on the NASDAQ/NMS or on such other exchange or quotation system on
which the Common Stock is then listed or quoted.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\sethu\06-2947-2\task913498\2947-2-ka.htm',USER='sesankaran',CD='Mar 14 03:58 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">b.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Section&nbsp;6.2
shall be amended to read in its entirety as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Option
Price</u>. The option price of Common Stock purchased with payroll deductions
made during each Offering for a participant therein shall be the lower of:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>85%
of the closing sale price of the stock on the NASDAQ Stock Market/National
Market System (&#147;NASDAQ/NMS&#148;) (or such other exchange or quotation system on
which the Common Stock is then listed or quoted) on the applicable Offering
Commencement Date (or on the nearest prior business day on which shares of
Common Stock are traded on the NASDAQ/NMS if no shares of Common Stock are
traded on the applicable Offering Termination Date);</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>85%
of the NASDAQ/NMS closing sale price of the stock on the NASDAQ/NMS (or such
other exchange or quotation system on which the Common Shares is then listed or
quoted) on the applicable Offering Termination Date (or on the nearest prior
business day on which shares of Common Stock are traded on the NASDAQ/NMS if no
shares of Common Stock are traded on the applicable Offering Termination Date).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Effective Date</u>.
This amendment shall be effective as of December&nbsp;31, 1995 and shall apply
to all existing options under the Plan and all options to be granted under the
terms of the Plan on or after December&nbsp;31, 1995.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Ratification</u>. In
all respect, other than as specifically set forth in Section&nbsp;1 above, the
Plan shall remain unaffected by this Amendment, the Plan shall continue in full
force and effect, subject to the terms and conditions thereof, and in the event
of any conflict, inconsistency, or incongruity between the provisions of this
Amendment and any provisions of the Plan the provisions of this Amendment shall
in all respects govern and control.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">To record the adoption of this amendment Plan
by the Board and approval by the stockholders, the Company has caused its duly
authorized officer to affix the corporate name and seal hereto.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SKYWEST,&nbsp;INC.,</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a Utah corporation</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.7%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">By:</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="23%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:23.14%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">/s/ Eric Christensen</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="23%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:23.14%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">

  </td>
  <td width="50%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.8(C)
<SEQUENCE>3
<FILENAME>a06-2947_1ex10d8c.htm
<DESCRIPTION>MATERIAL CONTRACTS
<TEXT>
<html>

<head>





</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.8(c)</font></b></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">AMENDMENT No.&nbsp;2</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">TO</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">SKYWEST,&nbsp;INC.</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1995
EMPLOYEE STOCK PURCHASE PLAN</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 7.0pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THIS
AMENDMENT, (the &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Amendment</font></b>&#148;) is
made this 12<sup>th</sup> day of June, 2000, by SkyWest,&nbsp;Inc., a Utah
corporation (the &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Company</font></b>&#148;) to be
effective July&nbsp;1, 2000.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 7.0pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">RECITALS</font></b></h2>

<h2 style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font style="font-weight:normal;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 7.0pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>,
effective November&nbsp;8, 1994, the Company adopted the SkyWest,&nbsp;Inc.
1995 Employee Stock Purchase Plan (the &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Plan</font></b>&#148;)
for the benefit of employees of the Company and the employees of certain of its
subsidiaries, which Plan the Company has previously amended.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 7.0pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 7.0pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>,
the Company has determined it is advisable and in the best interests of the
Company to amend the Plan to permit additional offerings through June&nbsp;30,
2005; and to reflect the adjustment made to the Plan&#146;s maximum share
limitations as a result of the Company&#146;s 1998 two-for-one stock split;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 7.0pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 7.0pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">NOW
THEREFORE</font></b>, upon these premises, the Plan is hereby
modified, altered, and amended effective July&nbsp;1, 2000, in the following
respects only:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 7.0pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 36.25pt;text-indent:-29.25pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font style="font-weight:bold;">Amendments</font></u>.</b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 36.25pt;text-indent:-29.25pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 79.0pt;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Section&nbsp;4.1
shall be amended to read in its entirety as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 79.0pt;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 43.0pt;text-indent:29.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font style="font-weight:bold;">Offerings</font></u>. </b>The Plan will be implemented
by ten annual offerings of Common Stock (the &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Offerings</font></b>&#148;)
beginning on the 1<sup>st</sup> day of July&nbsp;in each of the years 1995
through 2004, with each Offering terminating on June&nbsp;30 of the following
year; provided, however, that each annual Offering may, in the discretion of
the Committee exercised prior to the commencement thereof, be divided into two
six-month Offerings commencing, respectively, on July&nbsp;1 and January&nbsp;1,
and terminating on December&nbsp;31 and June&nbsp;30, respectively. The number
of shares of Common Stock that may&nbsp;be issued in any Offering shall not
cause the Plan to exceed the limitations of Section&nbsp;10.1 below. As used in
the Plan, &#147;Offering Commencement Date&#148; means the July&nbsp;1 or January&nbsp;1,
as the case may&nbsp;be, on which the particular Offering begins and &#147;Offering
Termination Date&#148; means the December&nbsp;31 or June&nbsp;30, as the case may&nbsp;be,
on which the particular Offering terminates.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 43.0pt;text-indent:29.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 79.0pt;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">b.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Section&nbsp;10.1
shall be amended to read in its entirety as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 79.0pt;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 43.0pt;text-indent:29.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font style="font-weight:bold;">Maximum Shares</font></u>. </b>The maximum number of
shares of Common Stock which may&nbsp;be issued under the Plan, subject to
adjustment as provided in Section&nbsp;12.4 below, shall be 1,000,000 shares
for all Offerings. The foregoing limitation reflects the Company&#146;s 1998
two-for-one stock split which resulted in the Plan&#146;s original 500,000 maximum
share limitation being increased to 1,000,000 shares. If the total</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\sethu\06-2947-2\task913498\2947-2-kc.htm',USER='sesankaran',CD='Mar 14 03:59 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .6in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">number of shares for which options are
exercised on any Offering Termination Date in accordance with Article&nbsp;6
exceeds the maximum number of shares set forth in this Section&nbsp;10.1, the
Company shall make a pro-rata allocation of the shares available for delivery
and distribution in as nearly a uniform&nbsp;manner as shall be practicable and
as it shall determine to be equitable, and the balance of payroll deductions
credited to the account of each participant shall be returned to him as
promptly as possible.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 43.0pt;text-indent:29.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font style="font-weight:bold;">Effective Date</font></u>. </b>This amendment shall be
effective as of July&nbsp;1, 2000, and shall apply to all options to be granted
under the terms of the Plan on or after July&nbsp;1, 2000.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font style="font-weight:bold;">Ratification</font></u>. </b>In all respects, other
than as specifically set forth in Section&nbsp;1 above, the Plan shall remain
unaffected by this Amendment, the Plan shall continue in full force and effect,
subject to the terms and conditions thereof, and in the event of any conflict,
inconsistency, or incongruity between the provisions of this Amendment and any
provisions of the Plan the provisions of this Amendment shall in all respects
govern and control.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">To record the adoption of this Amendment by
the Board, the Company has caused its duly authorized officer to affix the
corporate name and seal hereto.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">

  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.3</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.0%;">

  <td width="4%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:4.56%;">

  </td>
  <td width="82%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:82.62%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:9.32%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="4%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:4.56%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.1</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="82%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:82.62%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">TOP HEAVY PLAN REQUIREMENTS</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:9.32%;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">iii</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='iii',FILE='C:\JMS\nyang\06-2947-2\task904207\2947-2-ke-01.htm',USER='nyang',CD='Mar 10 21:41 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2004 RESTATEMENT OF THE</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SKYWEST, INC. EMPLOYEES&#146; RETIREMENT PLAN</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This 2004 Restatement of the SkyWest, Inc. Employees&#146; Retirement Plan
is hereby made and entered into this &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
day of June 2004, by and between SkyWest, Inc. (herein referred to as the &#147;Employer&#148;)
and Michael Kraupp, Alan Olson and Ann Olsen (herein referred to as the &#147;Trustee&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WITNESSETH:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the Employer heretofore established a Profit Sharing Plan and
Trust effective April 1, 1977, known as SkyWest, Inc. Employees&#146; Retirement
Plan (herein referred to as the &#147;Plan&#148;) in recognition of the contribution made
to its successful operation by its employees and the employees of its
participating affiliates and for the exclusive benefit of its eligible
employees and the employees of its participating affiliates; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, under the terms of the Plan, the Employer has the ability to
amend the Plan, provided the Trustees join in such amendment if the provisions
of the Plan affecting the Trustees are amended;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the Plan has previously been amended and restated at various
times; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, it is necessary and desirable to again amend and restate the
Plan;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOW, THEREFORE, the Employer and the Trustees in accordance with the
provisions of the Plan pertaining to amendments thereof, hereby amend and
restate the Plan in its entirety to provide as follows effective January 1,
2004:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE I</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">DEFINITIONS</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Act&#148; means the
Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, as it may be amended from time
to time.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Administrator&#148; means
SkyWest, Inc. unless another person or entity has been designated by SkyWest,
Inc. pursuant to Section 2.2 to administer the Plan on behalf of SkyWest, Inc..</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.3</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Affiliated Employer&#148;
means any SkyWest Airlines, Inc. and any other corporation which is a member of
a controlled group of corporations (as defined in Code Section 414(b)) which
includes SkyWest, Inc.; any trade or business (whether or not incorporated)
which is under common control (as defined in Code Section 414(c)) with the
Employer; any organization (whether or not incorporated) which is a member of
an</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='1',FILE='C:\JMS\nyang\06-2947-2\task904207\2947-2-ke-01.htm',USER='nyang',CD='Mar 10 21:41 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">affiliated service group (as defined in Code Section 414(m)) which
includes the Employer.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.4</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Aggregate Account&#148;
means, with respect to each Participant, the value of all accounts maintained
on behalf of a Participant, whether attributable to Employer or Employee
contributions, subject to the provisions of Section 9.2.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.5</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Anniversary Date&#148;
means the last day of the Plan Year.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.6</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Annuity Starting Date&#148;
means, with respect to any Participant, the first day of the first period for
which an amount is paid as an annuity under Section 6.1 below.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.7</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Beneficiary&#148; means the
person (or entity) to whom the share of a deceased Participant&#146;s total account
is payable, subject to the restrictions of Sections 6.2 and 6.6.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.8.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Catch-Up Contribution&#148;
means any Deferred Compensation Contributions on behalf of a Participant who
has or will attain age 50 or older during the Plan Year in question and which
constitutes a &#147;catch-up&#148; contribution within the meaning of Regulation Section
1.414(v)-1(a).&#160; Catch-Up Contributions shall
not be taken into account for purposes of applying the limitations of Code
Sections 402(g) and 415 and shall be disregarded in applying the provisions of
this Plan that implement Sections 401(k)(3), 401(k)(11), 401(k)(12), 410 and
416 of the Code.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.9</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Code&#148; means the
Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended or replaced from time to time.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.10</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Compensation&#148; with
respect to any Participant means such Participant&#146;s wages as defined in Code
Section 3401(a) and all other payments of compensation by the Employer (in the
course of the Employer&#146;s trade or business) for a Plan Year for which the
Employer is required to furnish the Participant a written statement under Code
Sections 6041(d), 6051(a)(3) or 6052.&#160;
Compensation must be determined without regard to any rules under Code
Section 3401(a) that limit the remuneration included in wages based on the
nature or location of the employment or the services performed (such as the
exception for agricultural labor in Code Section 3401(a)(2)).&#160; For purposes of this Section, the
determination of Compensation shall be made by including amounts which are
contributed by the Employer pursuant to a salary reduction agreement and which
are not includible in the gross income of the Participant under Code Sections
125, 132(f)(4), 402(e)(3), 402(h)(1)(B), 403(b) or 457(b).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For a Participant&#146;s initial year of participation in the component of
the Plan for which Compensation is being used, Compensation shall be recognized
for the entire Plan Year.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Compensation in excess of $200,000 shall be disregarded for all
purposes other than for purposes of salary deferral elections pursuant to
Section 4.2.&#160; The $200,000 limit shall be
adjusted for increases in the cost of living in accordance with Code Section</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">401(a)(17)(B), except that the dollar increase in effect on January 1
of any calendar year shall be effective for the Plan Year beginning with or
within such calendar year.&#160; For any short
Plan Year the Compensation dollar limit shall be an amount equal to the
Compensation limit for the calendar year in which the Plan Year begins
multiplied by the ratio obtained by dividing the number of full months in the
short Plan Year by 12.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.11</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Contract&#148; or &#147;Policy&#148;
means any life insurance policy, retirement income policy or annuity contract
(group or individual) issued pursuant to the terms of the Plan.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.12</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Deferred Compensation
Contributions&#148; with respect to any Participant means the amount of the
Participant&#146;s Compensation which has been contributed to the Plan in accordance
with the Participant&#146;s salary reduction and deferral election pursuant to
Section 4.2 excluding any such amounts distributed as excess &#147;annual additions&#148;
pursuant to Section 4.11(a)(2) below.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.13</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Designated Investment
Alternative&#148; means a specific investment identified by name by the Employer (or
such other Fiduciary who has been given the authority to select investment
options) as an available investment under the Plan to which Plan assets may be
invested by the Trustee pursuant to the investment direction of a Participant.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.14</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Directed Investment
Option&#148; means one or more of the following:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>a Designated Investment
Alternative; and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>any other investment
permitted by the Plan and the Participant Direction Procedures to which Plan
assets may be invested by the Trustee pursuant to the investment direction of a
Participant.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.15</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Elective Contribution&#148;
means (a) any Deferred Compensation Contributions, (b) any Employer matching
contribution made pursuant to Section 4.1(b) which is used to satisfy the &#147;ADP&#148;
test, and (c) any Employer Qualified Non-Elective Contribution made pursuant to
Section 4.1(c) and Section 4.7(b) which is used to satisfy the &#147;ADP&#148; test.&#160; Any Elective Contributions (whether or not
used to satisfy the &#147;ADP&#148; test or the &#147;ACP&#148; test) shall be subject to the
requirements of Sections 4.2(b) and 4.2(c) and shall satisfy the
nondiscrimination requirements of Regulation Sections 1.401(k)-1(b)(5) and
1.401(m)-1(b)(5), the provisions of which are specifically incorporated herein
by reference.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.16</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Eligible Employee&#148; means
any Employee of: (i) SkyWest, Inc., (ii) SkyWest Airlines, Inc., an Affiliate
of SkyWest, Inc. that previously adopted the Plan for its employees; and (iii)
any other Affiliated Employer which, with the consent of SkyWest, Inc., adopts
the Plan in writing for its Employees.&#160;
Notwithstanding the foregoing, Leased Employees are not Eligible
Employees and may not participate in the Plan.&#160;
If SkyWest, Inc., SkyWest Airlines, Inc. or another Affiliated Employer
classifies a worker for personnel and/or payroll purposes as an independent
contractor or other form of non-Employee service provider and a court or
governmental authority subsequently</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">determines that the worker is or was in fact a common law Employee, the
reclassified worker shall not be an Eligible Employee and shall not participate
in the Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.17 </font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Employee&#148; means any
person who is employed by SkyWest, Inc., SkyWest Airlines, Inc. or another
Affiliated Employer, and excludes any person who is employed as an independent
contractor.&#160; Employee shall include
Leased Employees within the meaning of Code Sections 414(n)(2) unless such
Leased Employees are covered by a plan described in Code Section 414(n)(5) and
such Leased Employees do not constitute more than 20% of the recipient&#146;s
non-highly compensated work force.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.18 </font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Employer&#148; means SkyWest,
Inc., any successor which shall maintain this Plan, SkyWest Airlines, Inc. and
any other Affiliated Employer that has adopted the Plan.&#160; Any provision herein to the contrary, unless
the context otherwise clearly requires, SkyWest, Inc. shall be treated as the
sole Employer for purposes of Articles II, VII, VIII and X.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.19 </font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Excess Aggregate
Contributions&#148; means, with respect to any Plan Year, the excess of the
aggregate amount of the Employer matching contributions made pursuant to
Section 4.1(b) (to the extent such matching contributions are not used to
satisfy the &#147;ADP&#148; tests), after-tax voluntary Employee contributions made
pursuant to Section 4.13, Excess Contributions recharacterized as after-tax
voluntary Employee contributions pursuant to Section 4.7(a) and any qualified
non-elective contributions or elective deferrals taken into account pursuant to
Section 4.8(c) on behalf of Highly Compensated Participants for such Plan Year,
over the maximum amount of such contributions permitted under the limitations
of Section 4.8(a) (determined by hypothetically reducing contributions made on
behalf of Highly Compensated Participants in order of the actual contribution
ratios beginning with the highest of such ratios).&#160; Such determination shall be made after first
taking into account corrections of any Excess Deferred Compensation pursuant to
Section 4.2 and taking into account any adjustments of any Excess Contributions
pursuant to Section 4.7.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.20 </font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Excess Contributions&#148;
means, with respect to a Plan Year, the excess of Elective Contributions made
on behalf of Highly Compensated Participants for the Plan Year over the maximum
amount of such contributions permitted under Section 4.6(a) (determined by
hypothetically reducing contributions made on behalf of Highly Compensated
Participants in order of the actual deferral ratios beginning with the highest
of such ratios).&#160; Excess Contributions do
not include Catch-Up Contributions.&#160;
Excess Contributions, including amounts recharacterized pursuant to
Section 4.7(a)(2), shall be treated as &#147;annual additions&#148; under Section
4.10(b).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.21</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Excess Deferred
Compensation&#148; means, with respect to any taxable year of a Participant, the
excess of the aggregate Deferred Compensation Contributions (excluding Catch-Up
Contributions) made on behalf of such Participant for such taxable year, over
the dollar limitation provided for in Code Section 402(g).&#160; Excess Deferred Compensation shall be treated
as an &#147;annual addition&#148; pursuant to Section 4.10(b) when contributed to the
Plan unless distributed to the affected Participant not later than the first
April 15th following the close of the Participant&#146;s taxable year.&#160; Additionally, for</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='4',FILE='C:\JMS\nyang\06-2947-2\task904207\2947-2-ke-01.htm',USER='nyang',CD='Mar 10 21:41 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">purposes of Sections 4.5 and 9.2, Excess Deferred Compensation shall
continue to be treated as Employer contributions even if distributed pursuant
to Section 4.2(f).&#160; However, Excess
Deferred Compensation of Non-Highly Compensated Participants is not taken into
account for purposes of Section 4.6(a) to the extent such Excess Deferred
Compensation occurs pursuant to Section 4.2(d).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.22</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Fiduciary&#148; means any
person who (a) exercises any discretionary authority or discretionary control
respecting management of the Plan or exercises any authority or control
respecting management or disposition of its assets, (b) renders investment
advice for a fee or other compensation, direct or indirect, with respect to any
monies or other property of the Plan or has any authority or responsibility to
do so, or (c) has any discretionary authority or discretionary responsibility
in the administration of the Plan.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.23</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Fiscal Year&#148; means the
Employer&#146;s accounting year of 12 months commencing on January 1 of each year
and ending the following December 31.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.24</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;415 Compensation&#148; with
respect to any Participant means such Participant&#146;s Compensation&#148; determined
without regard to any rules under Code Section 3401(a) that limit the
remuneration included in wages based on the nature or location of the
employment or the services performed (such as the exception for agricultural
labor in Code Section 3401(a)(2)).&#160; &#147;415
Compensation&#148; shall include any elective deferral (as defined in Code Section
402(g)(3)), and any amount which is contributed or deferred by the Employer at
the election of the Participant and which is not includible in the gross income
of the Participant by reason of Code Sections 125, or 132(f)(4).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.25</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Highly Compensated
Employee&#148; means an Employee described in Code Section 414(q) and the
Regulations thereunder, and generally means any Employee who:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>was a &#147;5% owner&#148; as
defined in Section 1.31(b) at any time during the &#147;determination year&#148; or the &#147;look-back
year&#148;; or</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>for the &#147;look-back year&#148;
had &#147;415 Compensation&#148; from the Employer in excess of $90,000.&#160; The $90,000 amount is adjusted at the same
time and in the same manner as under Code Section 415(d), except that the base
period is the calendar quarter ending September 30, 1996.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The &#147;determination year&#148; means the Plan Year, for which testing is
being performed, and the &#147;look-back year&#148; means the immediately preceding
12-month period.&#160; The determination of
who is a Highly Compensated Employee shall be made in accordance with
Regulation Section 1.414(q)-lT, A-4 and IRS Notice 97-45 (or any superseding
guidance).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.26</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Highly Compensated
Participant&#148; means any Highly Compensated Employee who is eligible to
participate in the component of the Plan being tested.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='5',FILE='C:\JMS\nyang\06-2947-2\task904207\2947-2-ke-01.htm',USER='nyang',CD='Mar 10 21:41 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.27</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Hour of Service&#148; means,
for purposes of eligibility for participation, (a) each hour for which an
Employee is directly or indirectly compensated or entitled to compensation by
the Employer for the performance of duties (these hours will be credited to the
Employee, for the computation period in which the duties are performed); (b)
each hour for which an Employee is directly or indirectly compensated or
entitled to compensation by the Employer (irrespective of whether the
employment relationship has terminated) for reasons other than performance of
duties (such as vacation, holidays, sickness, jury duty, disability, lay-off,
military duty or leave of absence) during the applicable computation period
(these hours will be calculated and credited pursuant to Department of Labor
regulation 2530.200b-2 which is incorporated herein by reference); and (c) each
hour for which back pay is awarded or agreed to by the Employer without regard
to mitigation of damages (these hours will be credited to the Employee for the
computation period or periods to which the award or agreement pertains rather
than the computation period in which the award, agreement or payment is
made).&#160; The same Hours of Service shall
not be credited both under (a) or (b), as the case may be, and under (c).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding 1.27(b) above, (i) no more than 501 Hours of Service
are required to be credited to an Employee on account of any single continuous
period during which the Employee performs no duties (whether or not such period
occurs in a single computation period); (ii) an hour for which an Employee is
directly or indirectly paid, or entitled to payment, on account of a period
during which no duties are performed is not required to be credited to the
Employee if such payment is made or due under a plan maintained solely for the
purpose of complying with applicable worker&#146;s compensation, or unemployment
compensation or disability insurance laws; and (iii) Hours of Service are not
required to be credited for a payment which&#146; solely reimburses an Employee for
medical or medically related expenses incurred by the Employee.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For purposes of 1.27(b) above, a payment shall be deemed to be made by
or due from the Employer regardless of whether such payment is made by or due
from the Employer directly, or indirectly through, among others, a trust fund,
or insurer, to which the Employer contributes or pays premiums and regardless of
whether contributions made or due to the trust fund, insurer, or other entity
are for the benefit of particular Employees or are on behalf of a group of
Employees in the aggregate.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For purposes of this Section, Hours of Service will be credited for employment
with other Affiliated Employers.&#160; The
provisions of Department of Labor Regulation Sections 2530.200b-2(b) and (c)
are incorporated herein by reference.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.28</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Inactive
Participant&#148; means a Participant who is no longer an Eligible Employee.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.29</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Income&#148; means the income
or losses allocable to Excess Deferred Compensation, Excess Contributions or
Excess Aggregate Contributions which amount shall be allocated in the same
manner as income or losses are allocated pursuant to Section 4.4(d).</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='6',FILE='C:\JMS\nyang\06-2947-2\task904207\2947-2-ke-01.htm',USER='nyang',CD='Mar 10 21:41 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.30</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Investment Manager&#148;
means an entity that (a) has the power to manage, acquire, or dispose of Plan
assets and (b) acknowledges fiduciary responsibility to the Plan in
writing.&#160; Such entity must be a person,
firm, or corporation registered as an investment adviser under the Investment
Advisers Act of 1940, a bank, or an insurance company.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.31</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Key Employee&#148; means a
key employee as defined in Code Section 416(i) and the Regulations
thereunder.&#160; An Employee or former
Employee is considered a Key Employee if the Employee, at any time during the
Plan Year that contains the &#147;Determination Date,&#148; is:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>an officer of the
Employer (as that term is defined within the meaning of the Regulations under
Code Section 416) having annual &#147;415 Compensation&#148; greater than $130,000 (as
adjusted under Code Section 416(i)(1) for any such Plan Year).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>a &#147;5% owner&#148; of the
Employer.&#160; A &#147;5% owner&#148; means any person
who owns (or is considered as owning within the meaning of Code Section 318)
more than 5% of the outstanding stock of the Employer or stock possessing more
than 5% of the total combined voting power of all stock of the Employer.&#160; In determining percentage ownership
hereunder, employers that would otherwise be aggregated under Code Sections
414(b), (c), (m) and (o) shall be treated as separate employers.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>a &#147;1% owner&#148; of the
Employer having annual &#147;415 Compensation&#148; from the Employer of more than
$150,000.&#160; A &#147;1% owner&#148; means any person
who owns (or is considered as owning within the meaning of Code Section 318)
more than 1% of the outstanding stock of the Employer or stock possessing more
than 1% of the total combined voting power of all stock of the Employer In
determining percentage ownership hereunder, Employers that would otherwise be
aggregated under Code Sections 414(b), (c), (m) and (o) shall be treated as
separate employers.&#160; However, in
determining whether an individual has &#147;415 Compensation&#148; of more than $150,000,
&#147;415 Compensation&#148; from each employer required to be aggregated under Code
Sections 414(b), (c), (m) and (o) shall be taken into account.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.32</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Leased Employee&#148; means
any person (other than an Employee of the recipient Employer) who pursuant to
an agreement between the recipient Employer and any other person or entity has
performed services for the recipient (or for the recipient and related persons
determined in accordance with Code Section 414(n)(6)) on a substantially full
time basis for at least one year under primary direction or control by the recipient
Employer.&#160; A Leased Employee shall not be
an Eligible Employee.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.33</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Non-Elective
Contribution&#148; means the Employer contributions to the Plan other than Elective
Contributions.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.34</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Non-Highly Compensated
Participant&#148; means any Participant who is not a Highly Compensated Employee.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='7',FILE='C:\JMS\nyang\06-2947-2\task904207\2947-2-ke-01.htm',USER='nyang',CD='Mar 10 21:41 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.35</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Non-Key Employee&#148; means
any Employee or former Employee (and such Employee&#146;s or former Employee&#146;s
Beneficiaries) who is not, and has never been a Key Employee.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.36</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Normal Retirement Age&#148;
means the Participant&#146;s 65<sup>th</sup> birthday.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.37</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Normal Retirement Date&#148;
means the first day of the month coinciding with or next following the date the
Participant attains Normal Retirement Age.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.38</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;One-Year Break in
Service&#148; means an eligibility computation period during which an Employee has
not completed more than 500 Hours of Service.&#160;
Further, solely for the purpose of determining whether a Participant has
incurred a One-Year Break in Service, Hours of Service shall be recognized for &#147;authorized
leaves of absence&#148; and &#147;maternity and paternity leaves of absence.&#148;&#160; Years of Service and One-Year Breaks in
Service shall be measured on the same computation period.&#160; &#147;Authorized leave of absence&#148; means an
unpaid; temporary cessation from active employment with the Employer pursuant
to an established nondiscriminatory policy, whether occasioned by illness,
