<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.12(C)
<SEQUENCE>6
<FILENAME>a06-2947_1ex10d12c.htm
<DESCRIPTION>MATERIAL CONTRACTS
<TEXT>
<html>

<head>





</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit 10.12(c)</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">AMENDMENT NUMBER TWO TO THE 2004 RESTATEMENT
OF THE</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">SKYWEST, INC. EMPLOYEES&#146; RETIREMENT PLAN</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Amendment Number Two to the 2004 Restatement of the SkyWest, Inc.
Employees&#146; Retirement Plan (the &#147;Plan&#148;) is hereby adopted this 22<sup>nd</sup>
day of December, 2005 to be effective as set forth below.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, SkyWest, Inc. (the &#147;Company&#148;) maintains the Plan for the
benefit of its employees and the employees of its participating subsidiaries;
and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, it is necessary and desirable to amend the Plan to reduce the
threshold for mandatory cash-out distributions under the Plan from $5,000 to
$1,000; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, on March 15, 2005 the Company adopted Amendment Number One to
the Plan on March 15, 2005 changing the Plan&#146;s ADP and ACP testing methods from
the &#147;prior year method&#148; to the &#147;current year method&#148; (&#147;Amendment One&#148;); and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, it is necessary and desirable to correct the effective date
stated in Amendment One to read &#147;January 1, 2005;&#148; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the Company has reserved the right to amend the Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOW, THEREFORE, the Plan is hereby amended as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Section 6.2(c) of the
Plan document is amended to read as follows effective March 28, 2005:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Notwithstanding
Section 6.2(b) above, if a former Participant&#146;s Vested Benefit exceeds $1,000,
the Participant is entitled to elect to receive distribution in the form of
either (i) a lump sum payment of his entire account balance, or (ii) monthly,
quarterly, semi-annual or annual cash payments over a designated period certain
subject to the following rules:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
Participant must designate in writing on such forms as the Administrator
provides for this purpose, the payout period over which any installment
distribution is to be made.&#160; Once the
installment method and payout period is elected, the Participant may not modify
that election other than to cancel the election and receive an immediate lump
sum distribution of any then-remaining Vested Benefit on such forms as the Plan
Administrator provides for that purpose.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
period of installment payments elected may not exceed the life expectancy of
the Participant or the joint life expectancy of the Participant and his
designated Beneficiary at the time distribution begins or otherwise cause the
Plan to violate the provisions of Section 6.4 below or Code Section 401(a)(9).</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='1',FILE='C:\JMS\nyang\06-2947-2\task904207\2947-2-ki.htm',USER='nyang',CD='Mar 10 21:44 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
amount of each such periodic installment payment shall equal the product of (i)
the Participant&#146;s account balance on the Valuation Date immediately preceding the
date of distribution (or such other Valuation Date as the Administrator
reasonably determines); multiplied by (ii) a fraction the numerator of which is
one and the denominator of which is the sum of one plus the remaining periodic
distributions to be made after the installment in question.&#160; The final installment payment shall be an
amount equal to the Participant&#146;s entire remaining Vested Benefit.&#148;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Section
6.2(e) of the Plan document is amended to read as follows effective March 28,
2005:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>If
a Participant&#146;s Vested Benefit exceeds $1,000, the following provisions shall
apply to that Participant:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
Plan cannot make distribution to the Participant without his consent until he
attains age 65.&#160; This restriction shall
cease to apply when the Participant dies.&#160;
If the Participant does not consent to a pre-age 65 distribution of his
Vested Benefit following termination of his employment with an Employer,
distribution of his Vested Benefit shall be deferred until he attains age 65
unless the Participant (and in the case of any Transfer/Rollover Account
subject to Section 6.5 below, the Participant&#146;s spouse) later consents to a
pre-age 65 distribution;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
Participant may elect to defer the commencement of benefits beyond age 65 to a
Participant-designated date that is no later than the minimum required
distribution deadline imposed under Section 6.4 below.&#160; Any election by a Participant to defer
distribution shall be made on such forms and in accordance with such uniform
procedures as the Administrator determines; and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Where
required under this Section 6.2(e), the consent of the Participant (and, if
applicable, his spouse) to commencement of distribution prior to attaining age
65 shall be obtained in writing within the 90-day period ending on the &#147;distribution
starting date.&#148;&#160; The &#147;distribution
starting date&#148; is the first day of the first period for which an amount is paid
in any form.&#160; The Plan Administrator
shall notify the Participant of the right to defer any distribution until the
Participant attains age 65. The notice shall include a general description of
the material features, and an explanation of the relative values of, the
optional forms of benefit available under the Plan in a manner that would
satisfy the notice requirements of Section 417(a)(3) of the Code and Section
6.5(e) below, and shall be provided no less than 30 days and no more than 90
days prior to the distribution starting date.&#160;
The Participant (and, if applicable, spouse) shall have at least 30 days
from the date of the notice to elect or reject an immediate distribution, but
may waive the 30-day waiting period.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This
subsection 6.2(e) shall not apply to any Participant other than a Participant
described in the first sentence of this subsection 6.2(e).&#148;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\JMS\nyang\06-2947-2\task904207\2947-2-ki.htm',USER='nyang',CD='Mar 10 21:44 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Section
6.3(d) of the Plan document is amended to read as follows effective March 28,
2005:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(d) </font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Notwithstanding
Section 6.3(c) above, if the deceased Participant&#146;s Vested Benefit at the time
of death exceeds $1,000, then subject to Section 6.4 below the Beneficiary may
elect as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>To
receive distribution in the form of either (i) a lump sum payment of the
deceased Participant&#146;s entire remaining Vested Benefit, or (ii) monthly,
quarterly, semi-annual or annual cash payments over a designated period certain
subject to the following rules:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
Beneficiary must designate in writing on such forms as the Administrator
provides for such purpose the period over which any installment distribution is
to be made.&#160; Once the installment method
and payout period is elected, the Beneficiary may not modify that election
other than to by electing on such forms as the Plan Administrator provides for
this purpose to cancel the election and receive an immediate lump sum distribution
of any then-remaining account balance.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
period of installment payments elected may not exceed the life expectancy of
the Beneficiary at the time distribution begins or otherwise cause the Plan to
violate the provisions of Section 6.4 below or Code Section 401(a)(9).</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
amount of each such periodic installment payment shall equal the product of (i)
the account balance on the Valuation Date immediately preceding the date of
distribution (or such other valuation Date as the Administrator reasonably
determines); multiplied by (ii) a fraction the numerator of which is one and
the denominator of which is the sum of one plus the remaining periodic
distributions to be made after the installment distribution in question.&#160; The final installment payment shall be an
amount equal to the Beneficiary&#146;s entire remaining account balance.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
Beneficiary may elect to defer the commencement of benefits to a
Beneficiary-designated date that is no later than the minimum required
distribution deadline imposed under Section 6.4 below, or by Code Section
401(a)(9).&#160; Any election by a Beneficiary
to defer distribution shall be made on such forms and in accordance with such
uniform procedures as the Administrator determines.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Section
6.3(d) shall only apply if the deceased Participant&#146;s Vested Benefit at the
time of death exceeds $1,000.&#148;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='3',FILE='C:\JMS\nyang\06-2947-2\task904207\2947-2-ki.htm',USER='nyang',CD='Mar 10 21:44 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
second sentence of Section 6.8 of the Plan document is amended to read as
follows effective March 28, 2005:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Notwithstanding the foregoing, if the value of a Participant&#146;s Vested
benefit derived from Employer and Employee contributions does not exceed
$1,000, then the amount distributable may, in the sole discretion of the
Administrator; either be treated as a forfeiture and applied to reduce Employer
matching contributions for the year of forfeiture and succeeding Plan Years
until fully applied, or be paid directly to an individual retirement account
described in Code Section 408(a) or an individual retirement annuity described
in Code Section 408(b) at the time it is determined that the whereabouts of the
Participant or the Beneficiary cannot be ascertained.&#148;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
effective dates of Amendment Number One and the changes to the Plan set forth
therein are hereby amended to read &#147;January 1, 2005.&#148;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>
Except as provided above, the Plan is hereby ratified and confirmed in all
respects.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">IN TESTIMONY WHEREOF, SkyWest, Inc. has caused this Amendment Number Two
to be executed by its duly authorized officer this 22<sup>nd</sup> day of December,
2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.13(a)</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ATLANTIC
SOUTHEAST AIRLINES,&nbsp;INC.<br>
INVESTMENT SAVINGS PLAN</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THIS
INDENTURE is made on February&nbsp;26, 2002, by ATLANTIC SOUTHEAST AIRLINES,&nbsp;INC.,
a corporation duly organized and existing under the laws of the State of
Georgia (hereinafter called the &#147;Primary Sponsor&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">W</font></u>  <u>I</u>
<u>T</u>  <u>N</u>  <u>E</u>  <u>S</u>  <u>S</u>  <u>E</u>  <u>T</u>  <u>H:</u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS,
the Primary Sponsor originally established the Atlantic Southeast Airlines,&nbsp;Inc.
Investment Savings Plan, effective October&nbsp;1, 1984 (the &#147;Plan&#148;), and last
amended and restated the Plan by indenture effective January&nbsp;1, 1989; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the Primary Sponsor now wishes to amend and
restate the Plan primarily to comply with and make changes permitted by the
provisions of the General Agreement on Trade and Tariffs, the Small Business
Job Protection Act of 1996, the Taxpayer Relief Act of 1997 and the Community
Renewal Tax Relief Act of 2000; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS,
the Plan is intended to be a profit sharing plan within the meaning of Treasury
Regulations Section&nbsp;1.401-1(b)(1)(ii)&nbsp;and also contains a cash or deferred
arrangement as described in Section&nbsp;401(k) of the Internal Revenue Code of
1986; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS,
the provisions of the Plan, as amended and restated herein, shall apply to Plan
Years beginning after January&nbsp;1, 1997, except to the extent the provisions
are required to apply at an earlier date or to any other members to comply with
applicable law;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOW,
THEREFORE, the Primary Sponsor does hereby amend and restate the Plan in its
entirety, generally effective as of January&nbsp;1, 1997, except as otherwise
provided herein, to read as follows:</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ATLANTIC

  </td>

 <tr>
  <td width="15%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.16%;">

  </td>
  <td width="79%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:79.26%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.58%;">
  <p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="15%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.16%;">

  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">PLAN LOANS</font></b></p>

  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.58%;">
  <p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">32</font></b></p>

 <tr>
  <td width="15%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.16%;">

  <td width="79%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:79.26%;">

  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.58%;">
  <p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="15%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.16%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">ARTICLE&nbsp;17</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="79%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:79.26%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">AMENDMENT TO OR TERMINATION OF THE PLAN AND THE TRUST</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.58%;">
  <p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">33</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="15%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.16%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="79%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:79.26%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.58%;">
  <p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="15%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.16%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">ARTICLE&nbsp;18</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="79%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:79.26%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">ADOPTION OF PLAN BY AFFILIATES</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.58%;">
  <p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">34</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="15%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.16%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="79%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:79.26%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.58%;">
  <p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="15%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.16%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">ARTICLE&nbsp;19</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="79%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:79.26%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">QUALIFICATION AND RETURN OF CONTRIBUTIONS</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.58%;">
  <p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">35</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="15%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.16%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="79%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:79.26%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.58%;">
  <p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="15%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.16%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">ARTICLE&nbsp;20</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="79%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:79.26%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">INCORPORATION OF SPECIAL LIMITATIONS</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.58%;">
  <p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">35</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="15%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.16%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="79%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:79.26%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.58%;">
  <p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="15%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.16%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">APPENDIX A</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="79%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:79.26%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">LIMITATION ON ALLOCATIONS</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.58%;">
  <p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">A-37</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="15%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.16%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="79%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:79.26%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.58%;">
  <p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="15%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.16%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">APPENDIX B</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="79%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:79.26%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">TOP-HEAVY PROVISIONS</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.58%;">
  <p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">B-1</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="15%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.16%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="79%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:79.26%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.58%;">
  <p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="15%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.16%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">APPENDIX C</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="79%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:79.26%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">SPECIAL NONDISCRIMINATION RULES</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.58%;">
  <p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">C-1</font></b></p>
  </td>
