<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.13(C)
<SEQUENCE>9
<FILENAME>a06-2947_1ex10d13c.htm
<DESCRIPTION>MATERIAL CONTRACTS
<TEXT>
<html>

<head>





</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.13(c)</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECOND AMENDMENT TO THE</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ATLANTIC SOUTHEAST AIRLINES, INC.</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">INVESTMENT SAVINGS PLAN</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THIS SECOND AMENDMENT is made on this 31st day of
December, 2002, by ATLANTIC SOUTHEAST AIRLINES, INC., a corporation duly
organized and existing under the laws of the State of Georgia (the &#147;Primary
Sponsor&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">W</font></u>  <u>I</u>  <u>T</u>  <u>N</u>  <u>E</u>
<u>S</u>  <u>S</u>  <u>E</u>  <u>T</u>  <u>H:</u></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS,
the Primary Sponsor maintains the Atlantic Southeast Airlines,&nbsp;Inc.
Investment Savings Plan (the &#147;Plan&#148;) which was last amended on May&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,
2002; and</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the Primary Sponsor now wishes to amend the
Plan primarily to comply with and make changes permitted by the Economic Growth
and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 (&#147;EGTRRA&#148;);</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, this amendment is intended as good faith
compliance with the requirements of EGTRRA and is to be construed in accordance
with EGTRRA and any guidance issued thereunder; and</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, this amendment shall supersede the provisions
of the Plan to the extent those provisions are inconsistent with the provisions
of this amendment.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOW, THEREFORE, the Primary Sponsor does hereby amend
the Plan effective as of January&nbsp;1, 2002:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>By
deleting the existing Section&nbsp;1.4 and substituting therefor the following:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;1.4</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#145;<u>Annual
Compensation Limit</u>&#146; means $200,000, which amount may be adjusted in
subsequent Plan Years based on changes in the cost of living as announced by
the Secretary of the Treasury.&#148;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>By
deleting the existing Section&nbsp;1.13 and substituting therefor the
following:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;1.4</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#145;<u>Disability</u>&#146;
means a disability of a Participant within the meaning of Code Section&nbsp;72(m)(7),
to the extent that the Participant is, or would be, entitled to disability
retirement benefits under the federal Social Security Act or to the extent that
the Participant is entitled to recover benefits under any long term disability
plan or policy maintained by the Plan Sponsor.&#148;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>By
deleting the existing Section&nbsp;1.18 and substituting therefor the
following:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;1.18</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#145;<u>Eligible
Retirement Plan</u>&#146; means any of the following that will accept a Distributee&#146;s
Eligible Rollover Distribution:</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><hr size="2" width="100%" align="center"></div>

</div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160; </font>an individual
retirement account described in Code Section&nbsp;408(a);</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160; </font>an individual
retirement annuity described in Code Section&nbsp;408(b);</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160; </font>an annuity plan
described in Code Section&nbsp;403(a)&nbsp;or an annuity contract described in Code
Section&nbsp;403(b);</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160; </font>a qualified trust
described in Code Section&nbsp;401(a); or</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160; </font>an eligible plan
under Code Section&nbsp;457(b)&nbsp;which is maintained by a state or political
subdivision of a state, or any agency or instrumentality of a state or
political subdivision and which agrees to separately account for amounts
transferred into such plan from this Plan.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Effective for distributions after December&nbsp;31,
2005, if any portion of an Eligible Rollover Distribution is attributable to
payments or distributions from a designated Roth account (as defined in Code Section&nbsp;402A),
an Eligible Retirement Plan with respect to such portion shall include only
another designated Roth account and a Roth IRA.&#148;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>By
deleting the existing Section&nbsp;1.19 and substituting therefor the
following:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;1.19</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#145;<u>Eligible Rollover Distribution</u>&#146;&#160; means any distribution of all or any portion
of the Distributee&#146;s Account, except that an Eligible Rollover Distribution
does not include:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160; </font>any distribution that is one of a series of
substantially equal periodic payments (not less frequently than annually) made
for the life (or life expectancy) of the Distributee or the joint lives (or
joint life expectancies) of the Distributee and the Distributee&#146;s designated
Beneficiary, or for a specified period of ten (10)&nbsp;years of more;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160; </font>any distribution to the extent such distribution
is required under Code Section&nbsp;401(a)(9);</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160; </font>any distribution which is made upon hardship of
the Employee; and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160; </font>except as otherwise provided in this Section, the
portion of any distribution that is not includable in gross income (determined
without regard to the exclusions for net unrealized appreciation with respect
to employer securities).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#145;Eligible Rollover Distribution&#146;
shall include any portion of the distribution that is not includable in gross
income provided such amount is distributed directly to one of the following:</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>an individual retirement account described in
Code Section&nbsp;408(a)&nbsp;or an individual retirement annuity described in
Code Section&nbsp;408(b)&nbsp;(other than an endowment contract); or</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>a qualified trust as described in Code Section&nbsp;401(a)&nbsp;but
only to the extent that</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(A)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the distribution is made in a direct
trustee-to-trustee transfer;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(B)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the transferee plan is a defined contribution
plan; and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(C)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the transferee plan agrees to separately account
for amounts transferred (including a separate accounting for the portion of the
distribution which is includable in income and the portion which is not
includable in income).&#148;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>By
deleting the existing Section&nbsp;1.37 and substituting therefor the
following:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;1.37</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#145;<u>Rollover Amount</u>&#146;
means any amount transferred to the Fund by a Participant, which amount
qualifies as an Eligible Rollover Distribution under Code Sections 402(c)(4),
403(a)(4), 403(b)(8), 408(d)(3)(A)(ii), or 457(e)(16), and any regulations
issued thereunder.&#160; Rollover Amount does
not include any amount that would not be includable in the Participant&#146;s gross
income if it was not rolled over.&#148;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;layout-grid-mode:both;letter-spacing:0pt;">6.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;layout-grid-mode:both;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;layout-grid-mode:both;letter-spacing:0pt;">By deleting the existing Section&nbsp;1.39
and substituting therefor the following:</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;1.39</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#145;<u>Termination
of Employment</u>&#146; means a severance from employment (within the meaning of
Code Section&nbsp;401(k)(2)(B)(i)(I)) of an Employee from all Plan Sponsors and
Affiliates for any reason other than death, Disability, or attainment of a
Retirement Date.&#160; Any absence from active
employment of the Plan Sponsor and Affiliates by reason of an approved leave of
absence shall not be deemed for any purpose under the Plan to be a Termination
of Employment.&#160; Transfer of an Employee
from one Plan Sponsor to another Plan Sponsor or to an Affiliate shall not be
deemed for any purpose under the Plan to be a Termination of Employment.&#160; In addition, transfer of an Employee to
another employer (other than a Plan Sponsor or an Affiliate) in connection with
a corporate transaction involving a sale of assets, merger, or sale of stock,
shall not be deemed to be a Termination of Employment, for purposes of the
timing of distributions under Section&nbsp;8.1, if the employer to which such
Employee is transferred agrees with the Plan Sponsor to accept a transfer of
assets from the Plan to its tax-qualified plan in a trust-to-trust transfer
meeting the requirements of Code Section&nbsp;414(l).&#148;</p>

<p align="center" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">3</font></p>

<div align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='3',FILE='C:\JMS\nyang\06-2947-2\task904207\2947-2-ko.htm',USER='nyang',CD='Mar 10 21:47 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;layout-grid-mode:both;letter-spacing:0pt;">7.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;layout-grid-mode:both;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">By deleting the existing Section&nbsp;3.1 and substituting
therefor the following:</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;3.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>(a)<font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Deferral
Amounts</u>.&#160; The Plan Sponsor shall make
a contribution to the Fund on behalf of each Participant who is an Eligible
Employee and has elected to defer a portion of his Annual Compensation
otherwise payable to him for the Plan Year and to have such portion contributed
to the Fund.&#160; Except to the extent
permitted under Section&nbsp;3.1(c)&nbsp;and Code Section&nbsp;414(v), the
contribution made by a Plan Sponsor on behalf of a Participant under this Section&nbsp;3.1(a)&nbsp;shall
be in one percent (1%) increments in an amount equal to the amount specified in
the Participant&#146;s deferral election, but not greater than twenty-five
percent&nbsp;(25%) of the Participant&#146;s Annual Compensation for the 2002 Plan
Year, and not greater than fifty percent (50%) of the Participant&#146;s Annual
Compensation for every Plan Year thereafter.&#160;
Pursuant to Section&nbsp;4 of Appendix C, the Plan Administrator may
restrict the amount which Highly Compensated Employees may defer under this Section&nbsp;3.1(a).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Limit on Deferral Amounts</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">. Except to the extent permitted under Section&nbsp;3.1(c)&nbsp;and
Code Section&nbsp;414(v), Elective Deferrals shall in no event exceed the limit
set forth in Code Section&nbsp;402(g)&nbsp;in any one taxable year of the
Participant.&#160; In the event the amount of
Elective Deferrals exceeds Code Section&nbsp;402(g)&nbsp;limit, in any one
taxable year then,</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">not later than the immediately following March&nbsp;1,
the Participant may designate to the Plan the portion of the Participant&#146;s
Deferral Amounts which consist of excess Elective Deferrals, and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">not later than the immediately following April&nbsp;15,
the Plan may distribute the amount designated to it under Paragraph (1)&nbsp;above,
as adjusted to reflect income, gain, or loss attributable to it through the end
of the Plan Year, and reduced by any &#145;Excess Deferral Amounts,&#146; as defined in
Appendix C hereto, previously distributed or recharacterized with respect to
the Participant for the Plan Year beginning with or within that taxable year.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The payment of the
excess Elective Deferrals, as adjusted and reduced, from the Plan shall be made
to the Participant without regard to any other provision in the Plan.&#160; In the event that a Participant&#146;s Elective
Deferrals exceed the Code Section&nbsp;402(g)&nbsp;limit, as adjusted, in any
one taxable year under the Plan and other plans of the Plan Sponsor and its
Affiliates, the Participant shall be deemed to have designated for distribution
under the Plan the amount of excess Elective Deferrals, as adjusted and
reduced, by taking into account only Elective Deferral amounts under the Plan
and other plans of the Plan Sponsor and its Affiliates.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Catch-Up Contributions</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">. Effective November&nbsp;1, 2002, a
Participant who is eligible to contribute Deferral Amounts to the Plan and who
has attained age 50 on or before the last day of the Plan Year shall be
eligible to elect to have a portion of his Annual Compensation otherwise
payable to him for</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='4',FILE='C:\JMS\nyang\06-2947-2\task904207\2947-2-ko.htm',USER='nyang',CD='Mar 10 21:47 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">the Plan Year contributed by the Plan Sponsor to the Fund on his behalf
as catch-up contributions in accordance with and subject to the limitations of,
Code Section&nbsp;414(v).&#160; Contributions
made pursuant to this Section&nbsp;3.1(c)&nbsp;shall not be taken into account
for purposes of implementing the limitations set forth in Section&nbsp;3.1(a),
3.1(b)&nbsp;and Appendix A hereto.&#160; The
Plan shall not be treated as failing to satisfy the provisions of Appendix B,
Appendix C or Code Section&nbsp;410(b), as applicable, by reason of the making
of the catch-up contributions as described in this Section&nbsp;3.1(c).</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Deferral
Elections</u>.&#160; The elections under this Section&nbsp;3.1
must be made before the Annual Compensation is payable and may only be made in
such manner and subject to such rules&nbsp;and limitations as the Plan
Administrator may prescribe and shall specify the percentage or dollar amount,
as applicable, of Annual Compensation that the Participant desires to defer
pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.1(a)&nbsp;and/or 3.1(c)&nbsp;and to have contributed
to the Fund.&#160; Once a Participant has made
an election for a Plan Year, the Participant may revoke or modify his election
to increase or reduce the rate of future deferrals, as provided in the
administrative procedures established by the Plan Administrator.&#148;</p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>By
deleting the existing Section&nbsp;3.4 and by substituting therefor the
following:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;3.4</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Rollover
Contributions</u>.&#160; Any Eligible Employee
may, with the consent of the Plan Administrator and subject to such rules&nbsp;and
conditions as the Plan Administrator may prescribe (which may include without
limitation prohibitions against transferring certain categories of Rollover
Amounts to the Plan), transfer a Rollover Amount to the Fund; provided,
however, that the Plan Administrator shall not administer this provision in a
manner which is discriminatory in favor of Highly Compensated Employees.&#148;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>By
deleting the existing header language of Section&nbsp;7.1 and substituting
therefor the following:</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;7.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#145;<u>Hardship Withdrawals</u>.&#146;&#160; The Trustee shall, upon the direction of the
Plan Administrator, withdraw all or portion of a Participant&#146;s Deferred Account
consisting of Deferral Amounts (but not earnings thereon), including Catch-Up
Contributions made pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.1(c), prior to the time such
account is otherwise distributable in accordance with the other provisions of
the Plan; provided, however, that any such withdrawal shall be made only if the
Participant is an Employee and demonstrates that he is suffering from &#145;hardship&#146;
as determined herein.&#160; For purposes of
this Section, a withdrawal will be deemed to be an account of hardship if the
withdrawal is on account of:&#148;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">10.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">By deleting the
existing Section&nbsp;7.2(a)(2)&nbsp;and by substituting therefor the
following:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-103.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the Plan
Sponsor shall not permit Elective Deferrals, including catch-up contributions
as described in Code Section&nbsp;414(v), or after-tax employee contributions
to be made to the Plan or any other plan</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">maintained
by the Plan Sponsor, for a period of six (6)&nbsp;months after the Participant
receives the withdrawal pursuant to this Section.&#148;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>By
deleting the existing Section&nbsp;7.2(a)(3)&nbsp;in its entirety.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>By
deleting the existing Section&nbsp;8.2(b)&nbsp;and by substituting therefor the
following:</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>his Matching
Account computed according to the following vesting schedule&nbsp;provided he
has completed at least one hour of Service during or after the 2002 Plan Year:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

</div>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">13.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">By deleting the existing Section&nbsp;8.6
in its entirety.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">14.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>By
deleting the existing Section&nbsp;11.1(a)&nbsp;in its entirety and by
substituting therefor the following:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>If the
vested Account balance of a Participant or a Beneficiary of a deceased
Participant<b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> </font></b>(in the case of a deceased
Participant who did not begin to receive payment of his vested Account balance
before his death) is $5,000 or less, without consideration of amounts
attributable to a Participant&#146;s Rollover Account, it shall be distributed in
one lump sum as soon as administratively practicable after the Participant or
Beneficiary is eligible for a distribution pursuant to Article&nbsp;8, 9, or
10, as applicable.&#148;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>By
deleting the existing header language of Section&nbsp;11.1(b)&nbsp;and
substituting therefor the following:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>If the
vested Account balance of a Participant or a Beneficiary of a deceased
Participant (in the case of a deceased Participant who did not begin to receive
payment of his vested Account balance before his death) exceeds $5,000, without
consideration of amounts attributable to a Participant&#146;s Rollover Account, and
the Participant or Beneficiary is eligible for a distribution pursuant to Article&nbsp;8,
9, or 10<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">,</font></b> as applicable, the Participant or
Beneficiary will receive payment of the Account in one lump sum unless the
Participant elects to receive payment in one of the forms listed below as soon
as administratively practicable after the Participant&#146;s or Beneficiary&#146;s
written request to the Plan Administrator for payment of the vested Account
balance.&#148;</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">16.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Effective
as of January&nbsp;1, 2003, by deleting the existing Sections 11.5(d)&nbsp;and (e)&nbsp;and
substituting therefor the following:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Distributions
will be made in accordance with Code Section&nbsp;401(a)(9)&nbsp;and the
regulations issued thereunder, including the incidental benefit
requirements.&#160; Notwithstanding the
foregoing, effective as of January&nbsp;1, 2003, any distributions pursuant to
Code Section&nbsp;401(a)(9)&nbsp;shall be administered in accordance with the
requirements of Appendix D hereto.&#148;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">16.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>By
deleting the existing Article&nbsp;20 to the Plan and substituting therefor the
following:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><u><font style="font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;20</font></u></b></font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">INCORPORATION OF SPECIAL LIMITATIONS</font></u></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Appendices A, B, C and D to the Plan, attached hereto,
are incorporated by reference and the provisions of the same shall apply
notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained herein.&#148;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Effective
as of January&nbsp;1, 2002, by deleting the existing Section&nbsp;1 of Appendix
A and substituting therefor the following:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Except to the extent permitted under Plan Section&nbsp;3.1(c)&nbsp;and
Code Section&nbsp;414(v), if applicable, the Annual Addition for any
Participant for any one limitation year may not exceed the lesser of:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>$40,000,
as adjusted under Code Section&nbsp;415(d); or</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>100% of
the Participant&#146;s Annual Compensation.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The limit described in Subsection&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;shall
not apply to any contribution for medical benefits after separation from
service (within the meaning of Code Section&nbsp;401(h)&nbsp;or 419A(f)(2))
which is otherwise treated as an annual addition.&#148;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">18.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>By
deleting Section&nbsp;2 of Appendix A to the Plan and substituting therefor the
following:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;For the purposes of this Appendix A, the term &#145;Annual
Addition&#146; for any Participant means for any Limitation Year, the sum of certain
Plan Sponsor, Affiliate, and Participant contributions, forfeitures, and other
amounts as determined in Code Section&nbsp;415(c)(2)&nbsp;in effect for that
Limitation Year.&#160; Participant
contributions shall be determined without regard to Rollover Amounts, employee
contributions to a simplified employee pension which are excludable from gross
income under Code Section&nbsp;408(k)(6), and catch-up contributions as
described in Code Section&nbsp;414(v).&#148;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">By adding the following paragraph to the
end of Section&nbsp;6 of Appendix A to the Plan:</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Notwithstanding anything contained in the Plan to the
contrary, the Plan Administrator may modify the provisions of this Section&nbsp;6
with respect to reduction of Participant&#146;s accounts in accordance with such
procedures as the Plan Administrator may establish with respect to catch-up
contributions described in Code Section&nbsp;414(v).&#148;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">20.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>By
deleting Section&nbsp;1(b)&nbsp;of Appendix B to the Plan and substituting
therefor the following:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#145;<u>Key
Employee</u>&#146; means an Employee or former Employee (including a Beneficiary of
a Key Employee or former Key Employee) who at any time during the Plan Year
containing the Determination Date was:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>an officer
of the Plan Sponsor or any Affiliate whose Annual Compensation was greater than
$130,000 (as adjusted for changes in the cost of living as provided in
regulations issued by the Secretary of the Treasury for Plan Years beginning
after December&nbsp;31, 2002) for the calendar year in which the Plan Year
ends, where the term &#145;officer&#146; means an administrative executive in regular and
continual service to the Plan Sponsor or an Affiliate; provided, however, that
in no event shall the number of officers exceed the lesser of Clause (A)&nbsp;or
(B)&nbsp;of this Subparagraph (1), where:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(A)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>equals
fifty (50) employees; or</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(B)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>equals the
greater of (I) three (3)&nbsp;employees or (II) ten percent (10%) of the number
of Employees during the Plan Year, with any non-integer being increased to the
next integer.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If for any year, no officer of the Plan Sponsor meets
the requirements of this Subparagraph (1), the highest paid officer of the Plan
Sponsor for the Plan Year shall be considered an officer for purposes of this
Subparagraph (1);</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>an owner
of more than five percent (5%) of the outstanding stock of the Plan Sponsor or
an Affiliate or more than five percent (5%) of the total combined voting power
of all stock of the Plan Sponsor or an Affiliate; or</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>an owner
of more than one percent (1%) of the outstanding stock of the Plan Sponsor or
an Affiliate or more than one percent (1%) of the total combined voting power
of all stock of the Plan Sponsor or an Affiliate, and who in such Plan Year had
Annual Compensation from the Plan Sponsor and all of its Affiliates of more
than $150,000.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='8',FILE='C:\JMS\nyang\06-2947-2\task904207\2947-2-ko.htm',USER='nyang',CD='Mar 10 21:47 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For purposes of determining ownership under
Subsections (2)&nbsp;and (3)&nbsp;above, the rules&nbsp;set forth in Code Section&nbsp;318(a)(2)&nbsp;shall
be applied as follows (i)&nbsp;in the case of any Plan Sponsor or Affiliate
which is a corporation, by substituting five percent (5%) for fifty percent
(50%) and, (ii)&nbsp;in the case of any Plan Sponsor or Affiliate which is not
a corporation, ownership shall be determined in accordance with Treasury
Regulations which shall be based on principles similar to the principles of
Code Section&nbsp;318 (modified as described in Clause (i)&nbsp;above).&#148;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">21.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>By
deleting Subsection&nbsp;(d)(1)(A)(i)&nbsp;of Section&nbsp;1 of Appendix B to
the Plan and substituting therefor the following:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">the present value of the cumulative
Accounts (excluding catch-up contributions as described in Code Section&nbsp;414(v)&nbsp;made
in the Plan Year in which the determination is being made) under the Plan for
all Key Employees exceeds sixty percent (60%) of the present value of the
cumulative Accounts (excluding catch-up contributions as described in Code Section&nbsp;414(v)&nbsp;for
the current Plan Year) under the Plan for all Participants; and&#148;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">22.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">By deleting Subsection&nbsp;(d)(3)(C)&nbsp;of
Section&nbsp;1 of Appendix B to the Plan and substituting therefor the
following:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(C)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For purposes of determining the present
value of the cumulative accrued benefit under a plan for any Participant in
accordance with this Subsection, the present value shall be increased by the
aggregate distributions made with respect to the Participant (including
distributions paid on account of death to the extent they do not exceed the
present value of the cumulative accrued benefit existing immediately prior to
death) under each plan being considered, and under any terminated plan which if
it had not been terminated would have been in a Required Aggregation Group with
the Plan, during the one-year period ending on the Determination Date or the
last day of the Plan Year that falls within the calendar year in which the
Determination Date falls.&#160; In the case of
a distribution made with respect to a Participant made for a reason other than
separation from service, death, or Disability, this provision shall applied by
substituting a five-year period for the one-year period.&#148;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">23.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>By
deleting Subsection&nbsp;(d)(3)(F)&nbsp;of Section&nbsp;1 of Appendix B to the
Plan and substituting therefor the following:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(F)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For purposes of this Paragraph (3), if
any Employee has not performed any service for a Plan Sponsor or an Affiliate
maintaining the Plan during the one-year period ending on the Determination
Date, any accrued benefit for than Employee shall not be taken into account.&#148;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='9',FILE='C:\JMS\nyang\06-2947-2\task904207\2947-2-ko.htm',USER='nyang',CD='Mar 10 21:47 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">24.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>By
deleting Subsection&nbsp;(b)(1)&nbsp;of Section&nbsp;2 of Appendix B to the
Plan and substituting therefor the following:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The percentage referred to in Subsection&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;of
this Section&nbsp;for any Plan Year shall not exceed the percentage at which
allocations are made or are required to be made under the Plan for the Plan
Year for the Key Employee for whom the percentage is highest for a Plan
Year.&#160; For purposes of this Paragraph, an
allocation to the Account of a Key Employee resulting from any Plan Sponsor
contribution attributable to a salary reduction or similar agreement shall be
taken into account but allocations of catch-up contributions as described in
Code Section&nbsp;414(v)&nbsp;shall not be taken into account.&#148;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">25.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">By deleting Subsection&nbsp;(d)(4)&nbsp;of
Section&nbsp;3 of Appendix C to the Plan and substituting therefor &#147;[Reserved].&#148;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">26.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">By deleting the existing Section&nbsp;4
of Appendix C to the Plan and substituting therefor the following.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;The Plan Administrator shall
have the responsibility of monitoring the Plan&#146;s compliance with the
limitations of this Appendix C and shall have the power to take all steps it
deems necessary or appropriate to ensure compliance, including, without
limitation, restricting the amount which Highly Compensated Eligible
Participants can elect to have contributed pursuant to Plan Section&nbsp;3.1(a).&#160; Any actions taken by the Plan Administrator
pursuant to this Section&nbsp;4 shall be pursuant to non-discriminatory
procedures consistently applied.&#148;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">27.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">By deleting Subsection&nbsp;(d)&nbsp;of Section&nbsp;5
of Appendix C and substituting therefor &#147;[Reserved].&#148;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">28.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">By deleting Subsection&nbsp;(e)&nbsp;of Section&nbsp;5
of Appendix C and substituting therefor the following:</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;The &#145;Actual Contribution Percentage&#146; a group of
Eligible Participants for a Plan Year is equal to the average of the ratios,
calculated separately for each Participant, of (A)&nbsp;to (B), where (A)&nbsp;is
the amount of Matching Contributions under the Plan (excluding Qualified
Matching Contributions which are used to apply the test set forth in Section&nbsp;2
of this Appendix C) and nondeductible employee contributions made under the Plan
for the Eligible Participant for the Plan Year, and where (B)&nbsp;is the
Annual Compensation of the Eligible Participant for the Plan Year. Except to
the extent limited by Treasury Regulation Section&nbsp;1.401(m)-1(b)(5)&nbsp;and
any other applicable regulations promulgated by the Secretary of the Treasury,
a Plan Sponsor may elect to treat Salary Deferral Contributions and Qualified
Nonelective Contributions as Matching Contributions for the purpose of
determining the Actual Contribution Percentage, provided the Salary Deferral
Contributions, excluding those treated as Matching Contributions, satisfy the
test set forth in Section&nbsp;2 of Appendix C.&#148;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>
